website_summaries.verdict: Use the LED light to make sure you get all those hard-to-reach hairs. Cuts seamlessly with 360° dual edge stainless steel blades.
pros: Sharp stainless steel blades avoid clamping hairs and cut instead
Includes detailed for eyebrows, ear hair and sideburns
Waterproof for easy clean, and the LED light is handy for examining for hard to reach hairs
cons: The tip of the trimmer can get too hot

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I liked the nose trimmer until the attachment for the nose, the blade, fell out. The other attachment for the face works fine. But I was very disappointed when the blade fell out of the nose trimmer attachment. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Works a few times
customer_reviews.text: Tweezing nose hairs is unnecessarily painful. I bought this as a better solution to that and for a little while it worked great. But after 5 uses the blades quit cutting and started pulling which is also painful. It’s a great product idea but just poorly made I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Awful. On- Off switch.
customer_reviews.text: Still struggling to turn it on and off. Horrible design. 8/20/2019 - It is now unavailable. Good thing. Besides the poorly designed switch, the cap won't stay on after about five uses.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Norman

customer_reviews.title: Good Trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. Batteries seem to last quite a long time and it does the job quietly and efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Zrob213

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product a few times before I found something that was a little more quality. For the price of this product it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Rummel

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy and fast you can use this but if you keep using it for a long time during a trim it will get hot but don’t worry it’s not dangerous hot. Also i wouldn’t trust in the light, it’s not that bright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WAY better than the panasonic and it cost less too
customer_reviews.text: WAY better than the panasonic and it cost less too
customer_reviews.author: J. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: He said this item works great on the nose hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my husband. He said this item works great on the nose hair. He really like the design and function of this item. So I highly recommend this product to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: The thing still runs, but doesn't trim any hair. Took about 6 months until it stopped working – now I have to buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Frahm

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to use.Ilove the light that's attached.It makes it easier to see those tiny hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Sheshopper

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: The nose hair trimmer part broke after a few uses - fell apart. Can only use the eyebrow trimmer now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made, Try Something Else.
customer_reviews.text: The cap is such a loose fit that it doesn't stay on. The on/off switch is a 2-1/2 inch long slider bar. I have to use a finger nail to move it to the ON position. There is an LED bulb which is too dull to be useful for anything other than getting some sucker to buy this thing. There was also a part fitting problem with the plastic piece that holds the cutter in place. The one positive thing I can say about this is that the cutting action is OK and better than the Panasonic that this replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Shaggy Bear

customer_reviews.title: OUCH!
customer_reviews.text: Works good, just a little too strong, pulls the hairs too hard. I cried--it's going in the recycle!
customer_reviews.author: CJH

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Had this product 2 years now. The nose and ear trimmer works well. Trimming ear hair is a little loud however. It has a little light on it that is a joke and probably drains the battery quicker, the light is not necessary. The sideburn trimmer was never used. But it is still working.
customer_reviews.author: JTassoni

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst product ever sold on Amazon. Stopped working after 3 uses and was delicate with it. Not worth the price at all, major regret and buyers remorse.
customer_reviews.author: Saint

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and makes it very easy to shape my beard.
customer_reviews.author: S83t

customer_reviews.title: Gift for son
customer_reviews.text: He loves this set and says it's very nice and was just what he needed!
customer_reviews.author: SNinPA

customer_reviews.title: Dull Trim
customer_reviews.text: The product is cheap and light, but the trim itself is not effective. I was hoping for a sharper cut.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yesss
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time and the battery is endless!!
customer_reviews.author: Alana Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good for guys
customer_reviews.text: Thumbs up! Good for guys, simple and has all what he needs. Not delicate enough for gals. As it shows in my photos, my bro loves it.
customer_reviews.author: B

product_meta.title: SUPRENT Nose & Ear Hair Trimmer, Wet/Dry Nose Hair Clipper for Businessmen with LED Light, Waterproof Stainless Steel Rotation Blade, 1 AA Battery-Include (Black)
feature_bullets: 420 STAINLESS-STEEL ROTATION BLADE: “R”-round 420 stainless-steel rotation inter blade can efficiently and powerfully capture nose hair in all-round 360°. Let you show your best at work.

6500 RPM MUTE MOTOR: With 6500 RPM and sharp blade, it supposedly avoids clamping nose hair and hurting nasal cavity. Noise is below 50 DB, you can use it confidently while your families are sleeping. Keep better work-family balance.
2 PCS TRIMMERS FOR STYLING: Nose/ear trimmer and detail trimmer for nose, ear, eyebrows, sideburns styling. Let you become a stylish man, anytime and anywhere.

IPX7 WATERPROOF & ANTI-INJURE LED LIGHT: IPX7 waterproof and washable, easily deal with residual by soak cleaning, even you take a shower. With LED light, it’s more convenient and safer. Avoid accidental injury to yourself when you trim your nose hair.

ENERGY CONSERVATION: Adopt total newly electric machinery of more sufficient power. Power-saving improve 5%, 1 AA battery can operate for more than 6 months if 5 min at a time. All black design is more in line with your capable business temperament.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
